page.title: 14Totternhoe Community Police
page.content: The village community police man is P.C. Slade-Pedrick. He lives in Totternhoe and his children have been to the school. He is community policeman for this village and several other neighbouring ones. He comes regularly to school and talks to the children about the work of a policeman, local dangers, road safety and shows films such as "Dont Go With Strangers". He undertakes similar work with other groups in his catchment area. There is an annual programme of visits to this school but it was all thrown into confusion by his being called to police duty in the North during the Miner's Strike. Our local police stations are in Dunstable and Leighton Buzzard. The school has recently entered a painting competition organised by the local police. We won two prizes.
